dmca.title: Notice of Copyright Violations by AUSTESTS.COM
dmca.body:
_____  

From: D. H. Pascoe & Co., Inc. [mailto:pascoe@yachtsurvey.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, January 17, 2006 7:26 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Notice of Copyright Violations by AUSTESTS.COM 


January 17, 2006

George Poletes, Corporate Counsel
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207
Phone #: (214) 782-7800
Fax #: (214) 782-7756
E-Mail: copyright@theplanet.com

Via Email and Express Mail

RE: Notice of Copyright Violations by AUSTESTS.COM (IP #: 69.93.41.134)

Dear Sir:

This is a notice of copyright violations by austests.com.

I, the undersigned, act on behalf of D. H. Pascoe & Co., Inc., the owner of
the exclusive copyrights to the materials listed in item "1." below.

1. Titles and URL's of 19 online articles (texts and all related graphics)
having been infringed.

        Note: D. H. Pascoe & Co., Inc. is the registrant of both domains;
yachtsurvey.com and docksidereports.com.

At  <http://www.yachtsurvey.com/> www.yachtsurvey.com:

In category "Boat Reviews"

Bertram 42 Convertible
<http://www.yachtsurvey.com/boatreviews/Bertram_42_convertible.htm>
http://www.yachtsurvey.com/boatreviews/Bertram_42_convertible.htm
MARLIN MONROW Bertram 42 Convertible
<http://www.yachtsurvey.com/Marlin_Monroe.htm>
http://www.yachtsurvey.com/Marlin_Monroe.htm
Boston Whaler Outrage 26
<http://www.yachtsurvey.com/boatreviews/boston_whaler_outrage_26.htm>
http://www.yachtsurvey.com/boatreviews/boston_whaler_outrage_26.htm
Cruiser 4280  <http://www.yachtsurvey.com/boatreviews/cruisers_4280.htm>
http://www.yachtsurvey.com/boatreviews/cruisers_4280.htm 
Grady-White Offshore 24
<http://www.yachtsurvey.com/boatreviews/GradyWhite24.htm>
http://www.yachtsurvey.com/boatreviews/GradyWhite24.htm
Sea Ray 370 AC  <http://www.yachtsurvey.com/boatreviews/SeaRay370ac.htm>
http://www.yachtsurvey.com/boatreviews/SeaRay370ac.htm 
Island Gypsy 40  <http://www.yachtsurvey.com/boatreviews/IslandGypsy40.htm>
http://www.yachtsurvey.com/boatreviews/IslandGypsy40.htm 
29 Blackfin Combi
<http://www.yachtsurvey.com/boatreviews/blackfin_29_combi.htm>
http://www.yachtsurvey.com/boatreviews/blackfin_29_combi.htm 
Trojan 10.8 Meter Convertible
<http://www.yachtsurvey.com/boatreviews/Trojan10-8meter.htm>
http://www.yachtsurvey.com/boatreviews/Trojan10-8meter.htm 
Sea Ray Sundancer 290
<http://www.yachtsurvey.com/boatreviews/sundancer_290.htm>
http://www.yachtsurvey.com/boatreviews/sundancer_290.htm

In category "Buying a Boat or Yacht"

To buy or Not to Buy ... A Blistered Boat, That Is
<http://www.yachtsurvey.com/BuyingBlisterBoat.htm>
http://www.yachtsurvey.com/BuyingBlisterBoat.htm
Sea Ray and Balsa Core Bottoms
<http://www.yachtsurvey.com/searay_balsa_core_bottoms.htm>
http://www.yachtsurvey.com/searay_balsa_core_bottoms.htm 
Top Twenty Construction & Design Faults
<http://www.yachtsurvey.com/TopTwenty.htm>
http://www.yachtsurvey.com/TopTwenty.htm 
Bubble Boats  <http://www.yachtsurvey.com/BubbleDecks.htm>
http://www.yachtsurvey.com/BubbleDecks.htm

In category "Maintenance, Repairs and Troubleshooting"

Failed Blister Repairs  <http://www.yachtsurvey.com/BlisterRepairFail.htm>
http://www.yachtsurvey.com/BlisterRepairFail.htm
Corrosion  <http://www.yachtsurvey.com/corrosion.htm>
http://www.yachtsurvey.com/corrosion.htm


At  <http://www.docksidereports.com/> www.docksidereports.com

Dangerous Ship Wakes
<http://www.docksidereports.com/dangerous_ship_wakes.htm>
http://www.docksidereports.com/dangerous_ship_wakes.htm
Sail Boat Auxiliaries
<http://www.docksidereports.com/sail_boat_auxiliaries.htm>
http://www.docksidereports.com/sail_boat_auxiliaries.htm 
Preventive Maintenance
<http://www.docksidereports.com/preventative_maintenance.htm>
http://www.docksidereports.com/preventative_maintenance.htm

 

2. Titles of articles and URL's having been infringing the exclusive
copyrights of D. H. Pascoe & Co., Inc.

        Note (a): Main differences between infringed and infringing pages
are:
-Name of author, David Pascoe, and copyright information along with other
elements; such as page header, navigation, side bars on original pages at
listed URL's in "1." above have been removed from infringing pages listed
below, except one that mentions author's name.
-In some cases, titles of articles have been changed as indicated in
parentheses.
-I noticed as of January 10, 2006 that in one article a sentence has been
added at the end, in one article last sentence and dollar amount changed,
in one article top two sentences removed, and in two articles short comments
have been added below the article titles.

        Note (b): All the materials are publicly accessible as of January
17, 2006, while internal links were removed at  <http://www.austests.com/>
www.austests.com as of January 10, 2006 after requests of removal of all the
infringing materials emailed to the administrative contact, Craig Orr, on
December 31, 2005 and January 3, 2006. 

At  <http://www.austests.com> www.austests.com:

Betram 42 Convertible http://www.austests.com/Bertram%2042.html
Bertram 42 Convertible 'Marlin Monroe'
<http://www.austests.com/BertramMarlinMonroe.html>
http://www.austests.com/BertramMarlinMonroe.html (MARLIN MONROE Bertram 42
Convertible)
BostonWhaler Outrage 26  <http://www.austests.com/BostonWhaler26.html>
http://www.austests.com/BostonWhaler26.html
Cruiser 4280  <http://www.austests.com/Cruisers%204280.html>
http://www.austests.com/Cruisers%204280.html
White Offshore 24 http://www.austests.com/Gradywhite24.html
Sea Ray 370 AC  <http://www.austests.com/Searay%20370AC.html>
http://www.austests.com/Searay%20370AC.html
Trojan 10.8  <http://www.austests.com/Trojan10.html>
http://www.austests.com/Trojan10.html (Trojan 10.8 Meter Convertible)
Sea Ray Sundancer 290  <http://www.austests.com/Searay29.html>
http://www.austests.com/Searay29.html
Island Gypsy 40  <http://www.austests.com/Islandgypsy40.html>
http://www.austests.com/Islandgypsy40.html
Blackfin 29 Combi  <http://www.austests.com/Blackfin29.html>
http://www.austests.com/Blackfin29.html (29 Blackfin Combi)
Osmosis  <http://www.austests.com/Osmosis.html>
http://www.austests.com/Osmosis.html ( To Buy or Not to Buy.... A Blister
Boats, That Is.)
Osmosis Repairs  <http://www.austests.com/Osmosis%20repair.html>
http://www.austests.com/Osmosis%20repair.html (Failed Blister Repairs)
Corrosion  <http://www.austests.com/Corrosion.html>
http://www.austests.com/Corrosion.html
Preventive Maintenance
<http://www.austests.com/Preventativemaintenance.html>
http://www.austests.com/Preventativemaintenance.html
Balsa Core Bottoms  <http://www.austests.com/Balsacoredbottoms.html>
http://www.austests.com/Balsacoredbottoms.html (Sea Ray and Balsa Core
Bottoms)
Bad Design Awards  <http://www.austests.com/Designfaults.html>
http://www.austests.com/Designfaults.html (Top Twenty Design & Construction
Faults)
Round Decks  <http://www.austests.com/Roundeddecks.html>
http://www.austests.com/Roundeddecks.html (Bubble Boats)
Dangerous Ship Wakes  <http://www.austests.com/Shipswake.html>
http://www.austests.com/Shipswake.html
Yacht Auxiliaries  <http://www.austests.com/Yachtauxiliaries.html>
http://www.austests.com/Yachtauxiliaries.html (Sail Boat Auxiliaries)

Please remove all the infringing materials from your hosting server(s) or
disable all access to them immediately.

I, the undersigned, have a good faith belief that use of the materials
described in item "2." is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent,
or the law.

Information in this notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury,
I, the undersigned, is authorized to act on behalf of D. H. Pascoe & Co.,
Inc., the owner of exclusive rights of the infringed materials.

If you have any questions or require additional information, please contact
me at:

Junko A. Pascoe, administrator
D. H. Pascoe & Co., Inc.
73 Bay Walk Court
Destin, FL 32550
Phone(direct): (850) 650-6949, or Phone(main): (850) 650-1255
Fax: (850) 650-1263
Email:  <mailto:pascoe@yachtsurvey.com> pascoe@yachtsurvey.com

We will appreciate your prompt attention to the matter.

Sincerely,

Junko A. Pascoe
Administrator
D. H. Pascoe & Co., Inc.

JAP/-
